description: {"blocks":[{"key":"54o77","text":"Onboarding for the Peña Lab includes a number of on-line and in-person trainings related to lab safety and animal care and use. It takes many hours to complete the online trainings, and several days for all of the in-person components. Please plan ahead, and don't save these things for last-minute or you won't be able to work in the lab!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":236,"length":103}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4tqn","text":"Updated 2022","type":"align-right","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anqgc","text":"","type":"align-right","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17pdo","text":"Peña Lab Onboarding at Princeton","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4reaf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3iajt","text":"Courses for mouse handling, lab safety, and biosafety","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9squr","text":"Complete the required AALAS Learning Library (ALL) training.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3tgd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi6s5","text":"Most steps to working with animals are outlined here: https://lar.princeton.edu/new-researcher","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":40}],"data":{}},{"key":"p4pt","text":"The information on the required courses and how to register can be found using this here. https://ria.princeton.edu/animal-care-and-use/training and click \"HERE\" to access https://sso.aalaslearninglibrary.org/Auth/Logon","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":4},{"key":2,"offset":90,"length":54},{"key":3,"offset":172,"length":47}],"data":{}},{"key":"5aevn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6hnb","text":"THIS IS A LOT OF TRAINING. IT TAKES DAYS. Some components are online, some are in person. Please plan ahead, and don't save these things for last-minute or you won't be able to work in the lab!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":193}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"12B7B878129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://lar.princeton.edu/new-researcher"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3D584079129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.princeton.edu/ria/animal-research-protectio/training"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3D9E9F5F12A011EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ria.princeton.edu/animal-care-and-use/training"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5B489EFE12A011EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://sso.aalaslearninglibrary.org/Auth/Logon"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5929s","text":"Follow the instructions under “Enroll in AALAS Learning Library.”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":30,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3v7gc","text":"Also complete the animal-specific AALAS tracks pertaining to MICE (listed below)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98c1b","text":"This takes ~ 6 hours. Plan accordingly. {"blocks":[{"key":"et90k","text":"Complete Animal Worker Health and Safety training and enroll in medical surveillance for MICE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":94}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mpbq","text":"Training is accessible on the EHS website (link is external). You will need your net ID and password to log in to the training ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":30}],"data":{}},{"key":"7cpog","text":"BIO-Animal Care Worker","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B97726D3129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ehs.princeton.edu/laboratory-research/animal-research/animal-worker-training"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d162g","text":"At completion of training, you will be directed to the Initial Health History Form (link is external). Answer the questions on the form and click on the \"Submit\" button, which sends the completed form to Employee Health Services. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":153,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":46}],"data":{}},{"key":"eptgk","text":"    NOTE: I am aware that this link may be outdated. If so, skip to the next step to contact UHS/EHS to schedule an in-person health monitoring appointment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":151}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BF2A7989129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://ehsapps.princeton.edu/BioSafety%20Forms/healthhistory.php"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6t8r5","text":"Contact University Health Services/Employee Health Services (link is external) at 609-258-5035 for an appointment. This appointment is ~20 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":82,"length":12},{"style":"italic","offset":115,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":70}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C408ADF6129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.princeton.edu/uhs/faculty-staff/employee-health-services"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lfr2","text":"Employee Health Services is located at McCosh Health Center (link is external).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":39}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C8DF7A96129B11EDB0F00A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.princeton.edu/~pumap/buildings/27.html"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8iusv","text":"Complete the orientation and facility tour process with Susie Chow, Associate Director, Laboratory Animal Resources. – CATE WILL HELP SCHEDULE. Walk-through takes ~1 hour","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":53},{"style":"italic","offset":119,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cnf4","text":"Submit an IACUC Amendment and get lab swipe access. CATE WILL DO THIS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3es3j","text":"Please email Cate 3 things:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajb63","text":"Your cell phone number","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78njh","text":"Your ID card (prox) #","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58l70","text":"The date you completed animal worker health monitoring (step 3)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Peña Lab Onboarding
